### Case() {#a0314bee77aa8cb1526a557ac8ce1bcf9}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename CallableT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>DerivedT &amp; llvm::detail::TypeSwitchBase&lt; DerivedT, T &gt;::Case (CallableT &amp;&amp; caseFn)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Invoke a case on the derived class, inferring the type of the Case from the first input of the given callable.

Note: This inference rules for this overload are very simple: strip pointers and references.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/typeswitch-h/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/typeswitch-h">TypeSwitch.h</a>.
